comment.author: 94276608@N00
comment._content: I'm thinking the map tool is putting this photo in the wrong spot, and shows the site in what is now Bellevue WA. Since there is a Beaver Lake in what is now the city of Sammamish, I think the photo is around here somewhere: maps.yahoo.com/#mvt=m&lat=47.587263&lon=-122.0029...

comment.realname: University of Washington Libraries Digital Collections
comment.author: 8337233@N06
comment._content: It is adding "Bellevue" to the location. I'll see how I can get that out of there. Thanks for pointing that out.
